text:
風が強く
なってきた…
登り続けて
大丈夫かな…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 51.86%;top: 21.23%;width: 14.26%;height: 13.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
先生
戻った方が
いいかも…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10.69%;top: 38.44%;width: 12.23%;height: 11.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
いや
もう遅い
山頂の方が
ロッジより
近い
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.33%;top: 42.85%;width: 12.45%;height: 13.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.41%;top: 41.90%;width: 6.70%;height: 7.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.01%;top: 69.42%;width: 8.40%;height: 4.40%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;transform:rotate(-15deg);

text:
でも先生
この天気は
予想外で
装備の強度も
不足してます
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.97%;top: 68.71%;width: 14.47%;height: 14.54%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
チッ
そうだな
この状況では
装備が
安っぽく
見える
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 34.73%;top: 69.10%;width: 12.55%;height: 13.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
分かった
装備を
取ってくる
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.20%;top: 72.01%;width: 11.28%;height: 11.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
